message: Let's start with a fair split. Accept and we can finish the game.
You want a fair split, but I want more now, let's negotiate!
I'm not sure I'm comfortable with a 50/50 split. I'll try to do better.
I'm willing to give you a slightly higher share, but I need to get a better deal for myself.
You're getting greedy, I'm getting desperate. Meet me in the middle!
I'm not sure I'm willing to give up that much more. I'll try to do better.
I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I need to get a better deal for myself. This is my final offer.
You're not budging, I'll take what I can get. This is my final offer!
I'm not going to give you the majority of the money. I'll try to do better.
I'm getting desperate, but I still think I can do better. This is my last chance to get a good deal.
You're running out of time, and I'm running out of patience. Take it or leave it!
Okay, fine. I'll take it. It's better than getting nothing.
